item.description:
Resturant week is coming to Boston, and to celebrate, we're headed to the Elephant Walk in Cambridge! I know I'm behind the times in trying this place for the first time, but for newtimers like myself, or those already in love with the French-Cambodian cuisine, it's sure to be a treat. And what better time to try it out than during Resturant week when fixed prices and menus make experimentation less daunting.

Check out the website for the Resturant Week menu, as well as for the stats including address and phone number.

http://www.elephantwa...

Reservations are at 6:30 sharp and limited to 8 members.

Will update on how to locate the group as the date approaches.

Please keep your RSVP accurately updated to allow all members the chance to attend.

Organizer: Lisa (the one on the waterfall:-)
item.name: Celebrate Resturant week--Elephant Walk in Cambridge
